docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, March 2. -- Press dispatches from Montevideo, Uruguay, say that a steamer arriving from Europe intercepted near the coast of Brazil a wireless message stating that British cruisers had captured the German auxiliary cruiser Mowe and had...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, March 2. -- Press dispatches from Montevideo, Uruguay, say that a steamer arriving from Europe intercepted near the coast of Brazil a wireless message stating that British cruisers had captured the German auxiliary cruiser Mowe and had taken the raider to the Island of Trinidad (a British possession off the coast of Venezuela.)
docs.abstract: German raider Moewe reported captured by British cruisers

headline.main: GERMAN RAIDER MOEWE REPORTED CAPTURED; Rumor Based on Wireless Picked Up by Incoming Steamer Off Coast of Brazil.

docs.snippet: LONDON, Feb. 15. (Correspondence of The Associated Press.) -- Great Britain and her allies have gone into the wheat business on a very extensive scale, the Governments themselves buying vast stocks of wheat -- 200,000 tons in Australia at a cost of...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Feb. 15. (Correspondence of The Associated Press.) -- Great Britain and her allies have gone into the wheat business on a very extensive scale, the Governments themselves buying vast stocks of wheat -- 200,000 tons in Australia at a cost of $16,000,000, 250,000 tons in Argentina at a cost of $20,000,000, and the whole remaining crop of Rumania at $50,000,000 -- in all about $86,000,000, probably the largest bulk expenditure.
docs.abstract: Allies buy large supplies; holdings of various belligerents

headline.main: WOULD REDUCE DUTY TO COVER FREIGHT; D.H. Martinez Suggests Way to Increase Business with South America. COUNTRIES ALL THRIVING Enormous Amount of Trade Can Be Done There by United States, Returned Traveler Says.

docs.snippet: The demonstrations in Rio de Janeiro in favor of the Allies are not without interest. That the creole element in a Portuguese State, long ruled by a King of Portugal and his descendants, should sympathize with the adventure of Portugal, under her...
docs.lead_paragraph: The demonstrations in Rio de Janeiro in favor of the Allies are not without interest. That the creole element in a Portuguese State, long ruled by a King of Portugal and his descendants, should sympathize with the adventure of Portugal, under her ancient tutor, into the world war, is natural enough; and enthusiasm, sometimes trouble, is not hard to find in Rio de Janeiro at any time.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 17. -- The Luckenhach Steamship Company of New York, it was learned here today, is planning to put on a line of freight steamers to South America, bigger than any now in the Latin-American trade. Scarcity of ships plying between...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 17. -- The Luckenhach Steamship Company of New York, it was learned here today, is planning to put on a line of freight steamers to South America, bigger than any now in the Latin-American trade. Scarcity of ships plying between North and South American ports has sent freight rates soaring within tile last year.
docs.abstract: Luckenbach S. S. Co. to open new line

headline.main: NEW LINE TO SOUTH AMERICA.; Luckenbachs to Operate Between New York and East Coast Ports.

docs.snippet: The American International Corporation, it was learned last night, has begun the work for which it was organized by accepting a contract for an important piece of public work engineering outside of this country. It will take entire charge of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The American International Corporation, it was learned last night, has begun the work for which it was organized by accepting a contract for an important piece of public work engineering outside of this country. It will take entire charge of the construction and financing of a new water supply system in Uruguay which is expected to be the forerunner of a number of similar contracts in South America.
docs.abstract: students of College of the City of N. Y. blame outsiders for demonstration against his preparedness speech

headline.main: WIN BIG ENGINEERING WORKS IN URUGUAY; International Corporation to Build a $5,000,000 Water Plant in South America. MORE CONTRACTS EXPECTED Money to be Spent Here -- New Foreign Trade Organization Moving in Many Countries.
